meanings: refuge, shelter, harborage, evacuation, ―하다 take[seek] refuge, take[find] shelter, retire to a safe place, get under cover, evacuate
Verb take refuge, be evacuated, flee

vlive.korean: [나 진짜 목에서 피 난 것 가탱...] [I think my throat is really bleeding...] View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 in TOKYO 8부_ep.3 신나는 토요일 불타는 이밤 유후~
vlive.english: [I think my throat is really bleeding...]

vlive.korean: 귀에서 피난 적 있냐고요? 너 내 귀에 언제 피냈니? "Have your ears bled before?" Have you done this to me? 듣기 View video KKOSISTERS : 사람이 인형이 되는 아트 메이크업(Ball-jointed Doll Art makeup)
vlive.english: "Have your ears bled before?" Have you done this to me?

vlive.korean: 쉴 수 있도록 도와주는 피난처 같은 역할을 저한테 해주는 거 같아요. helps me rest. She's like a refuge to me. 듣기 View video V Special : <진리상점> 랜선 개업식 in 설리 대표님방 LIVE
vlive.english: helps me rest. She's like a refuge to me.

vlive.korean: 요 근래 뜯은 일 중에 피난 적 한 번도 없으니까 저주하지 마! I have not bled recently while biting my lips, so don't give me a curse! 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 오랜만에승희다_!
vlive.english: I have not bled recently while biting my lips, so don't give me a curse!

vlive.korean: 땀 때문에 빨갛게 물들었어요. - 저는 진짜 피난 줄 알았어요. It was stained red from my sweat. - I really thought he was bleeding. 듣기 View video BTOB : [REPLAY] 비투비 I'll be your man
vlive.english: It was stained red from my sweat. - I really thought he was bleeding.

examples.korean: The church became a sanctuary for the refugees. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 교회는 난민들의 피난처가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The church became a sanctuary for the refugees. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They were forced to seek refuge from the fighting. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그 싸움을 피해 피난처를 찾아야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were forced to seek refuge from the fighting. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Locals were told to evacuate. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 지역 주민들은 피난을 가라는 말을 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Locals were told to evacuate. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Education is an ornament in prosperity and refuge in adversity. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 교육은 번영기에는 장식품이지만, 역경기에는 피난처이다. (그리스속담, 공부속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: Education is an ornament in prosperity and refuge in adversity. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We took a shelter from the storm in a barn. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 헛간에서 폭풍으로부터의 피난처를 찾았다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: We took a shelter from the storm in a barn. Add to Wordbook
